name: Teeth Whitening
description: Bleaching methods use carbamide peroxide which reacts with water to form hydrogen peroxide.

name: Cosmetic Dentistry
description: There are only 2 dental specialties that only focus on dental esthetics: Prosthodontics and Orthodontics

name: Dental Implants
description: The implant fixture is first placed, so that it is likely to osseointegrate, then a dental prosthetic is added.

name: Braces
description: According to scholars and historians, braces date back to ancient times. Around 400-300 BC.

name: Prevention
description: The most important part of preventive dentistry is to brush teeth with fluoride toothpaste approved by ADA.

name: Crowns and Bridges
description: Types of bridges may vary, depending upon how they are fabricated and the way they anchor to the adjacent teeth.
